body_content.explanation: intended to prevent piracy (= the act of illegally copying and selling music, films, computer programs, etc.):
examples: The company sells anti-piracy software to the film and television industries.
The government has introduced tough new anti-piracy legislation.

body_content.explanation: intended to prevent piracy (= the act of attacking ships in order to steal from them):
examples: Nato is considering a significant extension of its anti-piracy mission off the coast of Somalia.
The European Union recently launched an antipiracy operation in the gulf.
